question: Please analyze this URL https://kokoro-officekagu.com/
thought: I need to access the URL to obtain a status code and then extract the text in the HTML to see if there are any characteristics of a scam website. The website is live and accessible. Now I need to extract the text in the HTML to look for any scam characteristics. I now know the final answer The URL https://kokoro-officekagu.com/ is not a scam website.

answer.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The prices are not unusually low there are no claims of getting an impossible amount of money there are no texts targeting human psychological weaknesses there is no information on non-existent companies the products are common e-commerce items the contact information seems appropriate for business use the privacy policy is clear the payment methods are common and the information has been updated.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
